descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# THE HUNT BEGINS
Become one of the mercenaries called Hunters in this **PvPvE Extraction Shooter**. Undertake dangerous missions and **challenge other players** and in exchange freely scavenge the planets. You can **join forces** with other players, but be careful, hunting down other players to seize their valuable equipment is also an option! Going on an expedition comes with a high reward if you find valuable items, but it’s also high risk-if you die, you lose everything! 

[media]

# GATHER RESOURCES AND CRAFT
Collect resources such as gases, liquids, and metals. Each of the resources has its **special gathering tool**. Use the collected items to craft new and better equipment. The Mothership provides you with different **crafting stations**. Do you want to store them, sell for good money, or trade with other players? The choice is yours!

[media]

# MANAGE AND UPGRADE YOUR EQUIPMENT
Gather a **diverse range of weapons**. Upgrade stats and customize them with **elemental modifications**. Beware of other players lurking on the planets for your loot. To avoid being left with nothing, store some of them in your storage room to be ready for your next expedition.

[media]

# ENTER THE UNKNOWN 
Take up the challenge and fight for the loot on the uncharted territories of **a unique planet**, brimming with diverse landscapes, challenging terrains, and protected bases full of precious items. Discover a wealth of resources, hunt, and engage in an intense fight against a **multitude of enemies**.


[media]
